1.speaker: PENGUIN
1.character: シロクマくん　暇だから　何か問題出してよ
1.definition: Hey, Polar Bear. I'm a little bored, so give me a problem to solve.

3.speaker: POLAR BEAR
3.character: Ｔ字路と呼ばれる交差点

4.speaker: POLAR BEAR
4.character: 法令上の正式名称は　Ｔ字路ではありません
4.definition: The legal name for this kind of intersection is not actually "T-intersection."

5.speaker: POLAR BEAR
5.character: さて　何と言うでしょう

6.speaker: PENGUIN
6.character: もっと　フランクな問題がいいな
6.definition: I'd prefer something a little less complicated. There are many ways of manufacturing pre-washed rice.

7.speaker: POLAR BEAR
7.character: ＮＴＷＰ加工法という方法では　よく…
7.definition: But when using the NTWP manufacturing method, it's common— Actually, never mind.

10.speaker: SASAKO
10.character: パンダくん　いつもの？
10.definition: Would you like your usual, Panda? What's wrong? Want a trivia question?

12.speaker: PANDA
12.character: どうして　シロクマくんは　動物園に来てくれないの？
12.definition: why don't you come visit me at the zoo, Polar Bear?

13.speaker: POLAR BEAR
13.definition: What's this, all of a sudden?

14.speaker: PANDA
14.character: 僕は　いつもシロクマくんの仕事場に　遊びに来てるのに　ずるいよ
14.definition: I always come to visit you at work. It's not fair.

15.speaker: PENGUIN
15.character: カフェに　お茶しに来てるだけでしょ
15.definition: But you're coming to the café as a customer.

16.speaker: PANDA
16.character: 僕　人には　モテるんだからね　（　^ω^）
16.definition: I'm really popular with people, you know?

18.speaker: PANDA
18.character: 一度　動物園に遊びに来てよ
18.definition: Come visit me at the zoo at least once.

19.speaker: PANDA
19.character: 大人気で　びっくりするよ(#^.^#)
19.definition: You'll be surprised at how popular I am.

20.speaker: PANDA
20.character: 大人気で　びっくりするよ(#^.^#)
20.definition: You'll be surprised at how popular I am.

21.speaker: PENGUIN
21.definition: Why'd you have to say it twice?

22.speaker: PANDA
22.character: もしもし　シロクマくん？

23.speaker: PANDA
23.character: 明日　動物園に来る件だけど　忘れないでよ
23.definition: I'm calling to remind you to come to the zoo tomorrow.

24.speaker: PANDA
24.character: じゃあ　ペンギンさんにも　伝えておいてね

26.speaker: HANDA
26.character: なんだか　元気だね

27.speaker: PANDA
27.character: 今日　友達が僕のこと見に来るの
27.definition: My friends are coming to see me today.

29.speaker: HANDA
29.character: あっ　そうだ　今日は　常勤パンダさんが　娘さんの参観日だから　休むって
29.definition: Oh, that's right! Full-time Panda has the day off today because he's visiting his daughter's class.

31.speaker: PANDA
31.character: あれ？　ということは…
31.definition: Wait, that means... I'll be the only panda.

32.speaker: GIRL
32.character: パンダさん　かわいい～！＼(^o^)／
32.definition: You're so cute, Mr. Panda! Mr. Panda!

33.speaker: P.BEAR/PENGUIN
33.character: パンダく～ん！　かわいい！

34.speaker: PANDA
34.definition: All right! I'll do my best!

38.speaker: PENGUIN
38.character: 思ったより　広いね
38.definition: It's a lot bigger than I thought.

39.speaker: POLAR BEAR
39.character: まずは　パンダくんを見に行こう

40.speaker: ANNOUNCE
40.character: ただ今から　シロクマの　おやつタイムを行います
40.definition: We will now start the polar bear feeding time.

41.speaker: ANNOUNCE
41.character: シロクマが　プールへダイビングする姿を　どうぞお楽しみください
41.definition: Please enjoy watching the polar bear dive into the water!

42.speaker: POLAR BEAR
42.definition: I want to go see! That sounds amazing!

43.speaker: PENGUIN
43.definition: What? You want to see that?

44.speaker: PENGUIN
44.character: シロクマくんって　シロクマだよね？
44.definition: You're a polar bear, right, Polar Bear?

45.speaker: PENGUIN
45.character: シロクマが　シロクマのダイビングする姿が見たいの？
45.definition: You want to see a polar bear diving, Polar Bear? Let's go, let's go!

47.speaker: HANDA
47.character: そんなに飛ばして大丈夫？
47.definition: Are you doing okay, working that hard? Mr. Handa, when my friends come, please take our picture.

48.speaker: PANDA
48.character: でも　おかしいなぁ

49.speaker: PANDA
49.character: シロクマくんたち　１時って言ったのに　来ないね
49.definition: They said they'd be here around 1pm, but I don't see them anywhere.

50.speaker: PENGUIN
50.character: シロクマくん　駄目だよ　ほら
50.definition: We can't go in here, Polar Bear. Look.

53.speaker: PENGUIN
53.character: しろくま館へのシロクマの入館は　ご遠慮ください
53.definition: "We apologize for the inconvenience, but polar bears are not allowed in the Polar Bear Hall.

55.speaker: POLAR BEAR
55.character: こっそり入れば　バレない　バレない　(*￣∇￣)ノ
55.definition: If we sneak in quietly, they'll never even notice.

56.speaker: PENGUIN
56.character: いや　すごく目立ってるから
56.definition: No... I think we're pretty obvious. Wow! That's incredible!

58.speaker: ZOO KEEP
58.character: ちょっと　ちょっと　シロクマは　入れないって書いてあったでしょう
58.definition: Hey, hey! The sign clearly says no polar bears allowed!

59.speaker: ZOO KEEP
59.definition: It's really troublesome. Um... This is actually a stuffed animal.

60.speaker: ZOO KEEP
60.character: 今　動いてましたよ　剥製なわけないでしょう
60.definition: It was just moving! There's no way it's stuffed! Why aren't they here yet?

61.speaker: HANDA
61.character: もう行っていいかな？来たら呼んで
61.definition: Um, I'm going to go now. Call me when they get here.

62.speaker: POLAR BEAR
62.character: もう　叱られたじゃない

63.speaker: PENGUIN
63.character: 僕は　バレるって言ったのに
63.definition: I said we'd get in trouble.

64.speaker: POLAR BEAR
64.character: じゃあ　パンダくんとこに行こう

66.speaker: POLAR BEAR
66.character: パンダくん　かわいい　キャ～ッ　かわいい(>_<)
66.definition: You're so cute, Panda! You're so cute!

68.speaker: POLAR BEAR
68.character: パンダくん　遅れてごめん

72.speaker: PENGUIN
72.character: パンダくん　起きて(#`O′)

74.speaker: PENGUIN
74.character: パンダくん　おい　パンダくん！
74.definition: Panda! Hey! Panda! It's no use.

75.speaker: PENGUIN
75.character: 他のとこ回ってこようか

76.speaker: POLAR BEAR
76.character: 寝ててもいいなんて　うらやましい仕事だね
76.definition: I envy the fact that he's allowed to sleep at work.

77.speaker: PANDA
77.character: ハッ　今　ペンギンさんの声が
77.definition: Hey, I think I just heard Mr. Penguin! Aw, he's not here.

80.speaker: PANDA
80.definition: Did my friends happen to stop by? I didn't see them.

81.speaker: PANDA
81.character: ちゃんと写真撮ってよ
81.definition: Make sure you take our picture, 'kay?

83.speaker: POLAR BEAR
83.character: おっ　あざらし館　行こう　行こう
83.definition: Hey, the Seal Hall! Let's go!

84.speaker: PENGUIN
84.character: シロクマの入館は　ご遠慮ください

85.speaker: PENGUIN
85.character: あざらしが怖がるので…

87.speaker: POLAR BEAR
87.character: バレない　バレない

88.speaker: PENGUIN
88.character: いや　目立ってるし

89.speaker: POLAR BEAR
89.character: 食べない　食べない(*￣∇￣)ノ
89.definition: Don't worry, I won't eat you.

91.speaker: POLAR BEAR
91.character: 食べないとわかっていても　実際　本物見るとテンション上がるなあ
91.definition: Even though I know I won't eat one, I still get a little excited when I see one.

92.speaker: PENGUIN
92.character: シロクマくんの野性が　呼び覚まされないうちに　早く行こうよ
92.definition: Let's leave before your natural instincts take over.

93.speaker: ZOO KEEP
93.character: ちょっと　ちょっと

94.speaker: ZOO KEEP
94.character: シロクマは　入らないで　って書いてあったでしょう
94.definition: The sign clearly said no polar bears allowed! Oh, this is just a rug.

95.speaker: PENGUIN
95.character: ほ～ら　見てみて　こんなに　ふっかふかo(*￣▽￣*)o

96.speaker: POLAR BEAR
96.character: いや～　騙せないもんだね
96.definition: Wow. We can't seem to pull one over on them.

98.speaker: PENGUIN
98.character: パンダくん　そろそろ起きてるんじゃない？
98.definition: Panda might actually be awake now.

101.speaker: PENGUIN
101.character: よくあんな状態で寝られるね
101.definition: It's amazing that he can sleep in that position.

102.speaker: POLAR BEAR
102.character: あれは逆に尊敬するね
102.definition: I actually admire him for that.

103.speaker: HANDA
103.character: あの　もしかして　パンダくんのお友達ですか？
103.definition: Excuse me, are you Panda's friends?

106.speaker: HANDA
106.character: 撮ってくれって頼まれてるんで
106.definition: He asked me to take one.

107.speaker: POLAR BEAR
107.character: キリンさん　しろくまカフェに　来てくれないかな？
107.definition: I wonder if Mr. Giraffe will come to my café.

108.speaker: PENGUIN
108.character: いや　カフェに入れないでしょ
108.definition: No, I don't think he can get in.

109.speaker: POLAR BEAR
109.character: 別のところも回ってみよう
109.definition: Let's look around the other places, too.

111.speaker: POLAR BEAR
111.definition: So, where did you want to go? Oh, how about the Penguin Corner?

112.speaker: POLAR BEAR
112.character: ペンギンさん　曲芸に飛び入りしてよ
112.definition: You should join in their acrobatics act, Mr. Penguin.

113.speaker: PENGUIN
113.character: 僕　運動神経　悪いから

114.speaker: LLAMA
114.character: ちょっと　ちょっと

116.speaker: LLAMA
116.character: 今日は　どうしたんですか？
116.definition: What brings you here today? We came to see Panda, but he's asleep.

117.speaker: LLAMA
117.character: たまには　起きてますよ

118.speaker: PENGUIN
118.character: そっか　いいかげん　パンダくん　起きてるよね？
118.definition: Oh, okay. Panda should be awake by now.

121.speaker: POLAR BEAR
121.character: 更に　だらしないね
121.definition: And he looks even more shameless.

122.speaker: PENGUIN
122.character: パンダくん　僕たちに　いったい何を　見てもらいたかったんだろうね
122.definition: I wonder what exactly Panda wanted us to see.

123.speaker: GIRL
123.character: あのパンダさん　寝てばっかりで　つまんない
123.definition: That panda's so boring. All he does is sleep. Yeah, let's go! "Popular," huh?

124.speaker: PENGUIN
124.character: あ　また　笑った

125.speaker: PANDA
125.character: ず～っと待ってたのに　なんで来てくれなかったの？
125.definition: I was waiting the whole day. Why didn't you come?

126.speaker: PENGUIN
126.character: いや　何度も行ったよ
126.definition: Actually, we came by quite a few times.

128.speaker: PENGUIN
128.definition: We were there! Right, Mr. Llama? We met at the zoo today, right?

130.speaker: PENGUIN
130.character: ほら　ちゃんと行ったでしょ？
130.definition: See? We did go. Why didn't you come see me?

131.speaker: PENGUIN
131.character: だから　行ったんだって！
131.definition: I just said we did! You spent that much time watching Mr. Llama? I'm trying to tell you, we went to see you, too!

132.speaker: PANDA
132.character: じゃあ　なんで　会えなかったんだろうね
132.definition: I wonder why we didn't see each other, then.

133.speaker: PENGUIN
133.character: パンダくんが　寝てばっかりだったからでしょ
133.definition: It's because you were asleep the whole time.

134.speaker: PANDA
134.definition: You should have woken me up.

136.speaker: PANDA
136.character: せっかく半田さんが　写真　撮ってくれるって言ってたのに
136.definition: And Mr. Handa even said he would take pictures...

138.speaker: PANDA
138.character: ほんとだ　来てたんだね
138.definition: Wow, you really did come! That's what I've been saying. I'm so cute even when I'm sleeping.

139.speaker: PANDA
139.character: ねえねえ　どの寝顔が　いちばん好き？
139.definition: Hey, hey. Which sleeping face do you like best? Could I get another, Polar Bear? Polar  Bear's   Café

140.speaker: PENGUIN
140.character: 笹子さん　肉じゃがが好きな男って　どう思う？
140.definition: Miss Sasako, how do you feel about menwho like meat and potato stew? I'd rather not answer right now, if that's okay.

143.speaker: PANDA
143.character: ねえ　僕　いまだに　自然体っていうのがわからないの
143.definition: You know, I still can't figure out this "act naturally" thing. Just act naturally.

144.speaker: PANDA
144.character: いくら考えても　答えが出なくて
144.definition: No matter how much I think about it, I can't find the answer.

145.speaker: PANDA
145.character: 常勤パンダさん　自然体って何？
145.definition: What does it mean to act naturally, Mr. Full-time Panda?

147.speaker: PANDA
147.definition: Hey, Mr. Handa, what does it mean to "act naturally"?

148.speaker: PANDA
148.character: 言ったでしょ　「自然体でいいです」って
148.definition: You said it yourself, "just act naturally."

149.speaker: HANDA
149.character: 自然でいることが　自然体じゃないかな
149.definition: I think the act of acting naturally is "acting natural." Could you give me an example?

152.speaker: PANDA
152.character: 自然体って　どういうことなの？
152.definition: What does it mean to "act naturally"?

154.speaker: PENGUIN
154.character: 自然体かどうか　わかんないけど　かわいいね
154.definition: I don't know if that's acting natural or not, but it is cute.

157.speaker: PENGUIN
157.character: もう　かわいいのは　わかったよ

159.speaker: PANDA
159.character: かわいい　かわいいって言われても　どうしていいか　わかんなくて
159.definition: I keep getting called cute, but I still don't know what to do.

160.speaker: LLAMA
160.character: いいなぁ　僕も　かわいいって　言われてみたいですよ
160.definition: How nice. I wish someone would call me cute.

161.speaker: PANDA
161.character: ゴロゴロしてるだけなのになぁ
161.definition: All I'm doing is lounging around. You always look like you're having fun. I'm jealous.

163.speaker: OTTER
163.character: 僕さ　お腹で貝割るでしょ？ヾ(≧へ≦)〃
163.definition: You know I break shellfish on my tummy, right?

164.speaker: OTTER
164.character: あれって大変だよ　お腹痛くなる
164.definition: It's harder than it looks. It hurts my tummy.

165.speaker: OTTER
165.character: お腹に石だよ　笹子さん
165.definition: I'm banging a rock on my tummy, Miss Sasako.

167.speaker: OTTER
167.character: 自分のお腹を石で叩いてみなよ
167.definition: You should try banging a rock on your tummy.

170.speaker: POLAR BEAR
170.character: お腹で割らなければいいのに
170.definition: Then you shouldn't try breaking it on your tummy. But the audience loves seeing that.

171.speaker: PENGUIN
171.character: もうやめたら？　その出し物
171.definition: Why don't you give up that act?

172.speaker: OTTER
172.character: 出し物っていうか　習性だからね
172.definition: It's not really an act. It's more of a trait.

173.speaker: LLAMA
173.character: かわいいから　いいじゃないですか
173.definition: I think it's fine since it's cute.

174.speaker: OTTER
174.character: かわいいんだけどさ　もう　お腹が限界
174.definition: It's cute, but my tummy's had enough.

175.speaker: KOALA
175.character: かわいいで言ったら　私も　かわいいんですけど
175.definition: Since we're on the topic of cute, I'm cute, too.

177.speaker: KOALA
177.character: ユーカリ？　かわいく食べてますけど　もう　あれ限界です
177.definition: I'm cutely eating eucalyptus, but I'm at my limit.

178.speaker: KOALA
178.definition: I'm sick of it. I eat about one kilogram of that stuff a day.

179.speaker: KOALA
179.definition: You'd get teary-eyed, too, if you had to do it.

180.speaker: ANTEATER
180.definition: I know! I totally get you!

182.speaker: ANTEATER
182.character: アリクイって　やめて！
182.definition: I don't like the name Anteater! I don't want to eat  only ants all the time! I'm sick of them!

183.speaker: ANTEATER
183.character: 笹子さん　アリばっかり食べる気持わかる？
183.definition: Do you know how it feels to have to eat ants all the time, Miss Sasako?! I'm sorry?! I can't say that I do.

185.speaker: POLAR BEAR
185.definition: You don't have much of a choice.

186.speaker: ANTEATER
186.character: 確かに　そうだけど　もっと　いろんなもの食べてみたいよ
186.definition: I know, but I want to eat other things, too!

189.speaker: ANTEATER
189.character: ほら　ラーメンとかさ

190.speaker: PANDA
190.character: チャーシュー食べられないんじゃない？
190.definition: But I don't think you can eat chashu pork.

191.speaker: ANTEATER
191.character: いいんだよ　細かいところは
191.definition: You don't have to be concerned with the little things.

192.speaker: LLAMA
192.character: 見てくれるだけ　いいじゃないですか
192.definition: At least people look at you.

194.speaker: LLAMA
194.character: 僕なんて　みんな　ほぼ素通りですよ
194.definition: Everyone pretty much passes right by me.

195.speaker: LLAMA
195.character: いるの　気づいてます？
195.definition: Did you even know I was there?

197.speaker: POLAR BEAR
197.definition: When we went to the zoo... We did pretty much pass right by.

198.speaker: LLAMA
198.character: ほらね　ラマなんて　そんなものですよ
198.definition: See? That's how it is, being a llama.

199.speaker: LLAMA
199.character: もっと　じっくり見たり
199.definition: I wish people would look longer,

200.speaker: LLAMA
200.character: 行列つくって　感想とか言ってほしいですΣ(　￣д￣　)
200.definition: and form huge lines to tell me what they think of me.

202.speaker: GUY
202.character: おい　見ろよ！　草食ってるぞ！　写真　写真撮れって！
202.definition: Look, it's eating grass! Hurry! Take a picture!

205.speaker: PENGUIN
205.character: ラマさんって　ロバなの？
205.definition: Are you a donkey, Mr. Llama?

206.speaker: LLAMA
206.definition: As I said, I'm a llama.

207.speaker: LLAMA
207.character: どっちかというと　ラクダです
207.definition: If you had to compare, I'm closer to a camel.

210.speaker: SASAKO
210.character: あの…　何か芸とかないんですか？
210.definition: Um... Can you do any tricks or anything?

211.speaker: LLAMA
211.character: 草を食べるくらいです

212.speaker: LLAMA
212.character: あと　まつ毛が長いです(￣y▽￣)╭
212.definition: Other than that, my eyelashes are very long.

213.speaker: POLAR BEAR
213.character: できるといいね　行列
213.definition: I hope you get that huge line of yours.

214.speaker: TAPIR
214.character: 見られればいいってもんじゃないよ
214.definition: Being looked at isn't all that great.

216.speaker: TAPIR
216.character: 僕なんて　夢を食べる動物って　言われがちだけど
216.definition: I'm rumored to be an animal that eats dreams,

217.speaker: TAPIR
217.character: 見た人に夢がないなんて　言われてさ
217.definition: but everyone who sees me is unimpressed.

218.speaker: TAPIR
218.character: 夢を食べる動物って何？
218.definition: What kind of animal eats dreams, anyway?

219.speaker: TAPIR
219.character: ハードル上げすぎなんだよ
219.definition: They're setting the bar much too high.

220.speaker: PENGUIN
220.character: まぁまぁ…　ジュゴンさんよりは　いいよ
220.definition: Now, now. You're better off than the sea cow.

221.speaker: PENGUIN
221.character: 人魚って　前振りされてるんだから

222.speaker: GIRL
222.character: ママ！　人魚さん　どこ？

223.speaker: PENGUIN
223.character: 見た人　みんな黙っちゃうよ
223.definition: Everyone who sees it doesn't know what to say.

225.speaker: SASAKO
225.character: 私に聞かないでください…

227.speaker: TAPIR
227.character: ジュゴンさんに比べたら　僕は　まだ　マシかもね
227.definition: If you compare me to Ms. Sea Cow, I'm probably better off.

230.speaker: SLOTH
230.character: 動物園とは関係ないけど…
230.definition: I'm not associated with the zoo, but...

231.speaker: SLOTH
231.character: 僕って　一日中　木に　ぶら下がってるイメージあるけど…
231.definition: People think I just hang from a tree all day.

233.speaker: SLOTH
233.character: 実際　そうだけど…　大変　腕　パンパン
233.definition: I do in reality... But it's hard. My arms tingle.

234.speaker: SLOTH
234.character: 一日中　木に　ぶら下がったことある？笹子さん
234.definition: Have you ever hung from a tree all day, Miss Sasako? I can't say that I have.

235.speaker: PENGUIN
235.character: ナマケモノくんって　ナマケモノじゃないな
235.definition: I guess Sloth isn't really a sloth.

238.speaker: PENGUIN
238.character: みんな悩んでるんだな

240.speaker: PENGUIN
240.character: 実は　好きなペンギンがいてさ
240.definition: You see, I have this penguin that I like.

241.speaker: PENGUIN
241.character: 誰にも　言わないでほしいんだけどね

242.speaker: LLAMA
242.character: あぁ　やっぱり　いろいろと　皆さん悩みが尽きないんですね
242.definition: It seems that there isn't an end to everyone's problems.

245.speaker: PENGUIN
245.character: ちょっと　聞いてよ

246.speaker: TAPIR
246.character: シロクマさんは　悩みはないの？
246.definition: Don't you have any problems, Mr. Polar Bear?

248.speaker: PENGUIN
248.character: え？　そうなの？　意外

249.speaker: POLAR BEAR
249.character: アイドルにならないかって　言われてるんだけど
249.definition: I've been asked if I wanted to become an idol,

250.speaker: POLAR BEAR
250.character: アイドルと学業の両立がねぇ
250.definition: but fitting that inwith my studies would be hard.

252.speaker: PENGUIN
252.definition: How about you, Miss Sasako? I don't have any.

254.speaker: SASAKO
254.definition: Indeed. What is it? I was wondering if Hina dolls should go with the burnable or non-burnable garbage.

255.speaker: PENGUIN
255.character: いいかな？　それは　あとで
255.definition: How about we discuss that later?

256.speaker: PENGUIN
256.character: 僕なんてさ　パン屋に行くたびに思うよ
256.definition: Every time I go to the bakery, I think about it.

257.speaker: PENGUIN
257.character: いい？　誰にも言わないでよ

258.speaker: PENGUIN
258.character: どうやって告白しようか　悩みは尽きないよ
258.definition: I keep trying to figure out how to ask her out.

259.speaker: PENGUIN
259.character: どう思う？　パンダくん

260.speaker: PENGUIN
260.character: ちょっと笑いごとじゃないよ
260.definition: Hey, this is no laughing matter.

262.speaker: LLAMA
262.definition: Hm... I wonder how long he's been asleep.

263.speaker: POLAR BEAR
263.character: チャーシューの話のあとくらいじゃない？
263.definition: Probably somewhere right after the talk of chashu pork. So somewhere at the beginning of the conversation. Oh, Mr. Polar Bear.

264.speaker: LLAMA
264.character: おかわり　お願いします

267.speaker: PANDA
267.character: どうしたら　いいんだろう…
267.definition: I wonder what I should do?

268.speaker: FT PANDA
268.character: パンダくん　すっかり自然体だね
268.definition: Panda is totally acting naturally right now.

273.speaker: PENGUIN
273.character: あれから　ずっと考えてたんだけどさ

274.speaker: PENGUIN
274.character: パンダくんにとって　自然体っていうのはさ

275.speaker: PENGUIN
275.character: 君が　いちばんリラックスできる場所
275.definition: being in the place you can relax the most.

278.speaker: PANDA
278.definition: Never mind that, Mr. Penguin. I bought new panda merchandise.

279.character: 何入れればいいと思う？O(*≧▽≦)ツ
279.definition: What do you think I should put in here?

280.speaker: PENGUIN
280.character: 肉まんでいいんじゃない？

281.speaker: PANDA
281.character: ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん

282.speaker: PANDA
282.character: しろくまカフェが来週から駐車場になっちゃうって本当
282.definition: Is it true that Polar Bear's Café is being turned into a parking lot next week?

283.speaker: PENGUIN
283.character: そんな噂　聞いてないよ
283.definition: I didn't hear a rumor like that. Are you sure you haven't had plastic surgery?

285.character: だから　逆にどこを見て思ったの
285.definition: I ask again, what makes you think I did?

286.speaker: PANDA
286.character: しろくまくん　終わって
286.definition: Polar Bear, could you finish it? Sure.

288.speaker: POLAR BEAR
288.definition: Hm... It's "Café." Did you actually forget?
